description: Gathers rows in wide format to long format. See http://www.milanor.net/blog/reshape-data-r-tidyr-vs-reshape2.

input.name: key
input.description:
The name of the column to which keys are added.
Defaults to `key`.

input.name: value
input.description:
The name of the column to which values are added.
Defaults to `value`.
